text: Lance John Hamilton (born 5 April 1973) is a New Zealand cricketer. He made his ODI debut in the 2005 series against Australia from 1 March to 5 March 2005. Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:New Zealand One Day International cricketers Category:Central Districts cricketers Category:People from Papakura
title: Lance Hamilton
